title: Feature ID in EXT_mesh_features
description: Feature IDs stored in an attribute or texture.

featureCount.description: The number of unique features in the attribute or texture.

nullFeatureId.description: A value that indicates that no feature is associated with this vertex or texel.

attribute.description: An attribute containing feature IDs. When `attribute` and `texture` are omitted the feature IDs are assigned to vertices by their index.

propertyTable.description: The index of the property table containing per-feature property values. Only applicable when using the `EXT_structural_metadata` extension.
